title: Ice on Fire: The Test of Our Lives
description: In this sequel to the Lambda Literary Award finalist The Rest of Our Lives, author Dan Stone returns to the enchanting romance between Colm McKenna and Aidan Gallagher, both elemental witches who have been falling in love throughout the course of history thanks to the magic of reincarnation. Aidan begins having visions of an odd woman with a child who may have answers to the missing pieces of their pasts. Even more challenging, both men find themselves responsible for their bloodline. That means children! Life for these two lovers is about to get interesting....
author: Dan  Stone
